articles.title: Clouds Accused of Stealing the Sun's Spotlight
articles.description: In an unprecedented turn of events, local clouds have been charged with conspiracy to obscure the sun, leading to a dramatic decrease in vitamin D levels and an increase in comedic weather forecasts.
ways_to_achieve: Congregate in groups thick enough to block sunlight.
Move in mysterious ways to confuse meteorologists.
Refuse to part, even on days promised to be sunny.
Engage in a game of hide and seek with the sun.
benefits: Provides shade on unexpectedly hot days.
Inspires artists and poets with its moody aesthetic.
Decreases chances of sunburn, though increases complaints.
Forces indoor activities, leading to more board game sales.
